description: Featuring two Ralph Lauren icons, this sweater depicts the world's best-dressed bear playing polo with our signature Big Pony. At the left hem, our founder's initials are embroidered by hand.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 29" body length (front and back), a 19½" shoulder, a 55" chest, and a 26" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 30¾" body length (front and back), a 19½" shoulder, a 55" chest, and a 27¾" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes approx. ¼" between sizes.
Polo Bear and our signature Big Pony intarsia-knit and embroidered at the center front.
Rib-knit hem. "RL" hand-embroidered at the left hem.
Shell: 66% cotton, 34% linen. Design: 95% cotton, 5% mulberry silk. Exclusive of decoration.
